featured.text: They were behind schedule and had to apply for manpower to complete their project in time.
Since we are short of manpower in the factory, it is very ______

definition.zh_def: 人力，指可用於工作或生產的勞動力。
definition.en_def: The workforce or labor available for a particular task or project.
definition.example: The company needs more manpower to complete the project on time.
